|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q32FVSIG; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Zentel;A3S56D40GTP-50L; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->

|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr940n ''TP-LINK TL-WR940N'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] The TP-Link WR940N is identical to the TL-WR941ND (detachable) except that :the antennas are not detachable and the hardware version is different. (N - fixed (integral) antennas, ND - removable antennas) *[[TP-LINK TL-WR940N v1.x]] - [[TP-LINK TL-WR941ND v4.x]] *[[TP-LINK TL-WR940N v2.x]] - [[TP-LINK TL-WR941ND v5.x]] *[[TP-LINK TL-WR940N v3.x]] - [[TP-LINK TL-WR941ND v6.x]] There is no WR941ND-equivalent for v4, yet.
*3x 5dBi Fixed Omni Directional Antenna :The only difference between v3 and v4 is a more economic board layout :in v4 (smaller, different power supply) and an incompatible bootloader :(both U-Boot-Mods). The major hardware components are identical.
{{see also|TP-LINK TL-WR940N}}
==Links of Interest== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr940n '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
